description: Create a CSV that includes data from linked data types! Whoop whoop!
name: CSV Creator
plugin_instructions:
This plugin has only one action

CREATE A CSV FILE

To use, add a button to your page and start a workflow when that button is clicked. The action you add will be 

Data Things > Create a CSV File


The options

File Name
This can be dynamic or you can add static text here.

CSV Headers
Enter whatever headers you want included in your file with a comma between them like so: Cool Header 1,Great Header 2,Amazing Header 3. The number of headers determines the number of columns that will be generated

Column 
Enter a dynamic search. Remember that every column should have the same search or your CSV file will be inaccurate. Select a field or select a linked data type and then select a field from that object.


END THE EXPRESSION WITH ':join with line_break'!!!


Use Column Checkbox:
Simply tells the plugin whether you want to use the data in this column or not.
